      • extractFieldNameFromMove

        public java.lang.String extractFieldNameFromMove(Move m)
                                          throws NoFactorySetException
        extracts the field name from Move m. It is assumed that each move addresses exactly one field. TODO extend to handle more fields per move
        Specified by:
        extractFieldNameFromMove in interface IUserActionSupplementary
        Parameters:
        m - the move which contains the fields
        Returns:
        the field name or null
        Throws:
        NoFactorySetException

      • getFieldNameFromSemantic

        public java.lang.String getFieldNameFromSemantic(Semantic sem)
        Extracts the field name out of the semantic sem. Expects a semantic object which is related to exactly one semantic group.
        Specified by:
        getFieldNameFromSemantic in interface IUserActionSupplementary
        Parameters:
        sem - the semantic object
        Returns:
        the field name or null if something went wrong

      • getFieldFromSemantic

        public SemanticGroup getFieldFromSemantic(Semantic sem)
        Extracts the field semantic out of the semantic sem. Expects a semantic object which is related to exactly one master semantic.
        Parameters:
        sem - the semantic object
        Returns:
        the semantic identifying the field or null if no field is set

      • getFieldTotals

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getFieldTotals()
                                                                 throws NoFactorySetException
        Computes the number of possible elements of all fields (slots).

        Pseudo code:
        1. Find all moves which contain non-empty variableOperator. Regard only variableOperators containing "SET"
        2. Identify variable name and value.
          1. Collect variable object and resolve belongsToSemantic which represents the field name. Calls extractFieldNameFromMove(Move).
          2. Increase counter for this field
        3. return map
        Specified by:
        getFieldTotals in interface IUserActionSupplementary
        Returns:
        A Map object containing the numbmer of elements for all fields.
        Throws:
        NoFactorySetException

      • getTotalsFromSetString

        public static int getTotalsFromSetString(java.lang.String setString)
        Extracts the number of field totals out of a string. The input string has to comply to the following regexp: .*:external_[a-zA-Z0-9]+_mv:([0-9]+):.*
        Parameters:
        setString -
        Returns:
